formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'LookupBlacklist' =-
[Synopsis] Look up Caller*ID name/number from blacklist database
[Description] LookupBlacklist(options): Looks up the Caller*ID number on the active channel in the Asterisk database (family 'blacklist'). The option string may contain the following character: 'j' -- jump to n+101 priority if the number/name is found in the blacklist This application sets the following channel variable upon completion: LOOKUPBLSTATUS The status of the Blacklist lookup as a text string, one of FOUND | NOTFOUND Example: exten => 1234,1,LookupBlacklist()
This application is deprecated and may be removed from a future release. Please use the dialplan function BLACKLIST() instead.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -12,3 +12,6 @@ LOOKUPBLSTATUS The status of the Blacklist lookup as a text string, one of FOUND | NOTFOUND Example: exten => 1234,1,LookupBlacklist() + + This application is deprecated and may be removed from a future release. + Please use the dialplan function BLACKLIST() instead.
